data.text:
Making the KACEto Save You Time and Money November 2010

Why Dell KACE Appliances • The Leading Systems Management Appliances • KACE appliances save you time and your organization money • Comprehensive: Full PC and Server lifecycle management • Easy to use: Plug and play deployment and minimal training required • Affordable: Low total cost compared to software-only solutions • KACE customers typically install in under one day at a low total cost of ownership

Transform the Level of Work From Here… To Here! Saves you time. Saves your organization money. “50-80% of IT time is spent on manual repetitive software management tasks.” - Gartner

Systems Management Remains Difficult …all with limited staff and budget

Two Bad Options – Neither Are Good Management Suites Point Solutions • Expensive • Difficult to deploy • Overly complex • Costly to maintain • Extensive training • Professional Services • • Limited functionality • • Lack of integration • • Labor intensive • • Hard to use • • Multiple consoles

Traditional Software is Costly & Complex Licensing Costs Long Deployment Times Systems Management Software Vendors (i.e. LANDesk and Others) Weeks of Training Annual Subscription Fees Expensive Professional Services Costly Infrastructure & Maintenance

The Appliance Advantage Software: Assembly Required vs. • Rapid Deployment • Easy Maintenance & admin • High Performance & secure • Long deployments • Time consuming & complex maintenance • Performance & security not optimized

Single Agent Architecture Software: Assembly Required vs.

Advanced Communications Traditional Software vs. • Automated & Verified • Push & Pray

Built-in Remote Site Management Traditional Software New York New York vs. Miami Miami LA LA • Existing servers • Easy setup, admin & maintenance • Dedicated servers • Complicated setup, admin & maintenance

User-Centric Design Traditional Software vs. • Complicated tree-based UI • Simple tabbed UI

Additional Advantages

Training Dell KACE: More Than Just Great Products • Rapid: Hours not weeks • Customized: For your environment • Web-based: Remote and recorded • Free Kontinuing Education Support & Maintenance • Responsive: Web, E-mail and Telephone • Online: FAQ, Forums, Training Videos • Complete: Upgrades and Patches • Integrated: Support Tab

The Dell KACE Appliance Family

Dell KACE • More than 2,300 global organizations rely on Dell KACE appliances • Dell acquired KACE in 2010 • Recognized for innovation and excellence “We've seen KACE achieve significant traction, especially in the U.S., during the past 12 to 18 months.” - Gartner Group, “Emerging PC Lifecycle Configuration Management Vendors, ” Feb ‘09 Top 10 Products VMWorld 2008 Editor’ Choice, 2010 Editors’ Choice 2008

Hear What Dell KACE Customers Say Without KACE we would have had to hire two or three more people in the IT group. 62% of KACE customers report the appliance paid for itself in less than 6 months Michael Williams Director IT Dexter Schools 69% of KACE customers report they deployed in less than a week The KACE appliance literally saves me hours a day. 79% of customers rate KACE extremely high in customer satisfaction* Ron Marshall Desktop Support Manager TechSoup Global *Source: KACE Customer Survey, November 2010

Test Drive a Dell KACE Appliance Today • Download a Free Trial KACE Appliance at www.kace.com/trial • Contact Us • Phone(877) MGMT-DONE/(877) 646-8366(650) 316-1050 • E-mailsales@kace.com

Sample Dell KACE Customers

“Too Many Hats” Syndrome • • Understaffed, IT Generalist Who Wears Many Hats • • Few specialist skills, difficult to add staff or learn new skills • • Makes Decisions for Broad Set of Areas• Desktop mgmt, networking, security, etc • • Budget stretched across competing priorities • • Recurring fees/hidden costs create concerns Need: Easy to use solution that frees staff Need: Comprehensive, all in one solution Need: Affordable solution with fast ROI
